item.description:
From the ETTB website: THIS JUST IN!
Due to "weather" & an on-street parking ban imposed by the town of Westerly, tonight's gig at the Knickerbocker has been canceled. We'll be back there on Saturday, March 20th. See you then!

Mark your calendars for March 20th, and also watch for my dance posting for next Saturday!

Tom

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


After their great performance at the Brightridge Club, let's see them again at the Knickerbocker, 35 Railroad Avenue, Westerly. 9:00pm-12:30am. $15.00 admission.

The Knick offers a limited food menu,
or we can meet at one of Westerly's many restaurants before the dance.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: CANCELLED - Swing dance at the Knickerbocker, Westerly with Eight to the Bar!
